review: I bought this solely for the app PLEX, for which I have on a server and wanted to stream to my TV.  What a disappointment that I would be required to pay $4.99 for the PLEX app to be loaded when the advertisement shows PLEX installed, alluding that it's pre-installed.  This tool is ALL ABOUT PRIME.  It streams info from your Amazon account but only after you have to endure the cheesy video start and no way to skip it.The only cool feature is the packaging -- professionally packaged.I will be returning mine immediately.** Added **Amazon, FireTV, and affiliate company employees, family or friends -- please refrain from dumb or snarky comments.  If the box says PLEX on it and there's nothing online OR ON THE BOX that says, not all apps are FREE or INCLUDED, then AMAZON has committed FALSE ADVERTISING.  I have a smartTV.  It has everything but PLEX.  I thought I bought the BEST after thoroughly researching the various devices.  I failed to identify fraudulent advertising practices and now I have learned.  The solution is simple.  I'll attach my netbook and stream my PLEX server offsite to my TV through the netbook's HDMI output.Geeks find solutions.
author: Majkboy
